mapper.insert: insert into acct_balance_mod (ACCT_BALANCE_ID, BALANCE_TYPE_ID, PAYMENT_RULE_ID, SUB_ACCT_ID, ACCT_ID, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, BALANCE, RESERVE_BALANCE, CYCLE_UPPER, CYCLE_LOWER, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CYCLE_TYPE, REMARK, NEED_INVOICE_AMOUNT, SLICE_KEY ) values (#{acctBalanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{balanceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{paymentRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subAcctId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{balance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reserveBalance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cycleUpper,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cycleLower,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cycleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needInvoiceAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sliceKey,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

mapper.update:
update acct_balance_mod
BALANCE_TYPE_ID = #{balanceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PAYMENT_RULE_ID = #{paymentRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SUB_ACCT_ID = #{subAcctId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RESERVE_BALANCE = #{reserveBalance,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CYCLE_UPPER = #{cycleUpper,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CYCLE_LOWER = #{cycleLower,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CYCLE_TYPE = #{cycleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEED_INVOICE_AMOUNT = #{needInvoiceAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ACCT_BALANCE_ID = #{acctBalanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ACCT_ID=#{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND SLICE_KEY = #{sliceKey,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update acct_balance_mod set BALANCE_TYPE_ID = #{balanceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PAYMENT_RULE_ID = #{paymentRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SUB_ACCT_ID = #{subAcctId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ACCT_ID = #{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RESERVE_BALANCE = #{reserveBalance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CYCLE_UPPER = #{cycleUpper,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CYCLE_LOWER = #{cycleLower,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CYCLE_TYPE = #{cycleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEED_INVOICE_AMOUNT = #{needInvoiceAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SLICE_KEY = #{sliceKey,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ACCT_BALANCE_ID = #{acctBalanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(*) FROM ACCT_BALANCE WHERE ACCT_BALANCE_ID=#{ACCT_BALANCE_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND SLICE_KEY=#{ACCT_BALANCE_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
